last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: The conclusion of the crime thriller. A visit to the Isle of Eris turns Lexie's world upside down as she discovers crucial information that leaves her with an impossible decision.

name: Payback
overview: Lexie Noble lives a great life on the outskirts of Edinburghâ€¦ until her husband is murdered. As she struggles to make sense of what happened, she learns he had been laundering money for notorious crime boss Cal Morris. As a partner in her late husband's accountancy firm, both Morris and the police will be interested in controlling her next moves.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: With an idyllic family lifestyle in the suburbs of Edinburgh, Lexie is unaware her husband, Jared, has been laundering Cal Morris' illegal earnings on a vast scale. Lexie then becomes entangled in a perilous police operation to topple a notorious crime lord, Cal Morris.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Lexie Noble's stable family life in Edinburgh is plunged into jeopardy when her accountant husband Jared is attacked in the street.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Feeling increasingly isolated and deceived, Lexie is left with no choice but to agree to help crime boss Cal Morris with a secret business transaction.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When Lexie is confronted by DCI Adam Guthrie over her relationship with Cal Morris, she is faced with a hard decision that leads her to live a double life.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Having been left to fend for herself by the police, Lexie focuses all her resources on the task at hand and edges closer to uncovering Cal's missing money.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A shocking revelation in Vilnius leads Lexie to confront the brutal reality of Cal's world and the sickening realisation of who she's dealing with.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The conclusion of the crime thriller. A visit to the Isle of Eris turns Lexie's world upside down as she discovers crucial information that leaves her with an impossible decision.
